price: (50) And this [Qur’ān] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?[890]
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
footnotes: [890]- i.e., pretending ignorance, disapproving or refusing to acknowledge it?

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
